biotools.summary: Chaplin (Case-control haplotype inference package.) is a software program for identifying specific haplotypes or haplotype features that are associated with disease using genotype data from a case-control study.

bioschemas.name: Chaplin
bioschemas.summary: Chaplin (Case-control haplotype inference package.) is a software program for identifying specific haplotypes or haplotype features that are associated with disease using genotype data from a case-control study.
